title: BE tied to level ups is terrible.
body:
This new change is an attempt to squeeze money off people. Level ups take too long and the rewards insignificant. I got less BE on a champion capsules than i did on a regular capsule. 

I have no incentive to play more than 1 game everyday. Never cared for paragon leveling. At least before i got something tangible after every game.

This is like any other game I've played with daily quests..... I won't be playing in a few weeks.

replies.body:
I think riot would have realised by now that from the amount of complaints they have been getting will (hopefully) be giving BE after every game for more consistency. BE after every game is a much better system, I don't mind the leveling but it should just be for extra little rewards when you level up

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The levelling is wrong.. BE after each game would be good. But the levelling takes forever

BE after each game would be amazing (and shouldn't have been changed)! For leveling, at the very least change it so that it's quicker to get to 30 (like Riot said they would, but clearly didn't).

But we all know Riot care more about money than the actual players...
They could just make it easier to level to level 30 then make it more challenging to reach the other levels.
I agree. The levelling system is horrible. they tripled the amount of xp required to level up. whilst we do earn double the amount of XP per game it still takes too long
I worry that these changes will incentivise botting to avoid the grind.

im wondering if it's just past 30 level that takes so much to level up, ie is 1-30 fast like old days, 
and yes the BE is bullshit, i cant even grind for champs now, every level is what 1k but it takes so long, sadly i seen this in other mobas too, 
we will now have to spend that 10$ to get the champs we like ,
it's fast if your a casual and only play the first win of the day, otherwise it's longer.

Yea, a lot of people agree. I made a poll here: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/KsZvsY4T-revert-be-to-ip?sort_type=best 
Rito has actually replied as well
